column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Thank you for your wonderful feedback.  I'm glad you enjoyed Jinya Ramen Bar and we look forward to your many visits very soon.  Each month we will be offering a new ramen of the month as well as a new appetizer.  For April
column2: we will be offering the new Crispy Shrimp Ball and our new ramen called the Cha Cha Cha.  If you love garlic
